NORTH TEXAS 

Denton Texas is abuzz with the news PERIOD The last time the Mean Green since when do colors have personality traits went to a bowl game Eisenhower was president a firstclass postage stamp cost four cents and Americans were jamming to the tunes of Nat King Cole and Frank Sinatra PERIOD Now  years later UNT has finally made it back snapping the longest current bowl drought among Division IA schools PERIOD After an  start Dickeys crew staged a comeback collecting five consecutive conference victories en route to the inaugural Sun Belt title PERIOD Despite its losing record UNT is playing in the New Orleans Bowl by virtue of an NCAA exemption that allows conference champs to enter a bowl without the mandated six victories PERIOD Part of its turnaround can be credited to the defense and linebacker Brad Kassell whose numbers include  tackles five pass breakups and two interceptions PERIOD The Mean Greens running game has been on as well led by running back Kevin Galbreaths . yards per game PERIOD However if UNT wants to compete with Colorado State it must get the ball in the air PERIOD Mean Green quarterback Scott Hall averages just . yards passing per game PERIOD

 EN

VS PERIOD

COLORADO STATE 

Dont ever count CSU out of the race PERIOD After sitting at  overall and  in the Mountain West conference the Rams won four of their final five games to finish  in conference play PERIOD They were impressive in their final regularseason game capitalizing on five interceptions thrown by New Mexicos quarterback to snap a threegame Lobo win streak PERIOD However its always an adventure for the Rams PERIOD Seven of CSUs games were decided by seven points or less PERIOD The Rams were  in those games PERIOD Special teams were key in the Rams lateseason comeback leading the league in kickoff returns . net punting . and punt returns . pERIOD They were also a perfect  of  on extra points PERIOD Inconsistency at quarterback has hurt the Rams though PERIOD D.J PERIOD Busch and Bradlee van Pelt lacked the experience and talent to put CSU in contention for a championship this season combining for  touchdown passes and  interceptions PERIOD Several injuries at running back didnt help the Rams much on offense either PERIOD But if they can bring it all together in New Orleans the Rams have a legitimate shot PERIOD
